required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of RC28-E Injection in Diabetic Retinopathy
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Open-label, Multicenter Study of the Efficacy and Safety of RC28-E Injection in Subjects With Moderately Severe to Severe Nonproliferative Diabetic Retinopathy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, open-label, multicenter study of the efficacy and safety of RC28-E injection (a chimric decoy receptor trap fusion protein by dual blockage of VEGF and FGF-2) in the treatment of patients with moderately severe to severe nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy.

primary_outcome.measure: The proportion of subjects who have improved by ≥2 steps from baseline in DRSS score at week 24, 52
primary_outcome.description: The Diabetic Retinopathy Disease Severity Scale (DRSS) may be used to describe overall retinopathy severity as well as the change in severity over time. Here, DRSS describes severity level 47 (moderately severe NPDR) and level 53 (severe NPDR) at week 24, 52 from baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Developed a Vision-Threatening Complication Due to Diabetic Retinopathy at Week 24, 52
secondary_outcome.description: Vision-threatening complications are defined as the composite outcome of proliferative diabetic retinopathy (inclusive of participants who have vitreous hemorrhage or tractional retinal detachment believed to be due to PDR) and anterior segment neovascularization (ASNV) (participants with neovascularization of the iris and/or definitive neovascularization of the iridocorneal angle).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Developed Central Involved-Diabetic Macular Edema (CI-DME) at Week 24, 52;
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of participants who developed CI-DME at week24, 52 were reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean Change from Baseline in Best Corrected Visual Acuity (BCVA);
secondary_outcome.description: Measurement of visual acuity with Early Treatment Diabetic Retinopathy Study (ETDRS) charts.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in DRSS score;
secondary_outcome.description: The Diabetic Retinopathy Disease Severity Scale (DRSS) may be used to describe overall retinopathy severity as well as the change in severity over time. Here, DRSS describes severity level 47 (moderately severe NPDR) and level 53 (severe NPDR) at week 24, 52 from baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Received Panretinal Photocoagulation (PRP) at Week24, 52;
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of participants who received panretinal photocoagulation (PRP).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants who undergoing Vitrectomy at Week24, 52;
secondary_outcome.description: The percentage of participants who undergoing vitrectomy.
Incidence of AE in ocular and non-ocular

arm_group.description: Subjects received 1.0mg intravitreal RC28-E injection every 4 weeks for 3 visits followed by injections every 8 weeks.

Subjects received 1.0mg intravitreal RC28-E injection every 4 weeks for 5 visits followed by injections an as needed (PRN) schedule based upon the physician assessment in accordance with pre-specified criteria.
Subjects received 2.0mg intravitreal RC28-E injection every 4 weeks for 3 visits followed by injections every 8 weeks.

Subjects received 1.0mg intravitreal RC28-E injection every 4 weeks for 5 visits followed by injections an as needed (PRN) schedule based upon the physician assessment in accordance with pre-specified criteria.

intervention.description: a chimric decoy receptor trap fusion protein by dual blockage of VEGF and FGF
